node.text:
Get a taste of Southern California in a can ☀️ 

This Belgian-style wit is an instant favorite around here. Crisp and uniquely complex with notes and aromas of fennel, clove, coriander, and lemon peel, Just a Twist is your new summer must-have. Plus, we hear it pairs perfectly with picnics. 🧺

node.text:
Cross-industry innovation at its finest— this collaboration brings the 🔥

Abuelita’s Special was inspired by @trejosdonuts’ Abuelita donut, their mouth-watering raised donut with chocolate frosting with a dark chocolate crumble. To recreate the Mexican chocolate flavors, we added the perfect balance of cinnamon and cocoa powder for a sweet spice flavor for that fresh-outta-the-oven taste. At 10.5% ABV, this tasty stout is the perfect treat for any donut or beer lover.

The Donut Box will be available to the general public on 6.2.21 to celebrate #nationaldonutday on 6.4.21. Tap that link in our profile for more details on this doughy release.

node.text:
Look, sometimes you just make something fun and delicious with friends. This is that. 

Crème de la Crème was inspired by @thedonuttery's Crème Brûlée donut, their take on the decadent dessert. With this beer, we created a brand new base beer: an 11.1% bourbon barrel-aged blonde stout treated with dulce de leche, salt, and Madagascar vanilla beans to recreate the toffee, burnt sugar, and vanilla notes present in the donut.
The Donut Box will be available to the general public on 6.2.21 to celebrate #nationaldonutday on 6.4.21. Tap that link in our profile for more details on this doughy release.

node.title: The Donut Box- Créme de la  Créme

node.text:
Lucky 13— that’s the saying, right? This May marks thirteen years of crafting innovative beers, and we’re ready to party. After all, we’ve got a whole year’s worth of celebration bottled up! This July we’ll be hosting our 1̶2̶t̶h̶ 13th Anniversary with a festival at The Bruery. Tickets go on sale to the general public this Thursday, 5.27. Members had early access to purchase tickets, and they’re moving quickly, so get yours now before they're sold out.

We’re also pulling out some very special beers from the cellar that we’ve kept locked in the archive until now, and you can get access to them right now. Tap the link in our profile to learn more about the Anniversary Celebration, and head to thebruery.com right now to shop our celebratory archive sale. Cheers!

node.text:
Something exciting is coming, and you donut want to miss it!

The Donut Box is dropping Wednesday, 6.2, just in time for National Donut Day. Sure, we had to taste through dozens of donuts and travel far and wide to find the very best creators; it's not an easy job, but somebody had to donut… er, do it. Get ready for four unique, hand-crafted beers, each inspired by show-stopping donuts from each of our talented donut partners.

Can't wait for all this donutty goodness? Our Society Members get early access: Hoarders on 5.31, Reserve and Preservation on 6.1, and public on 6.2. Mark your calendars for our next Virtual Happy Hour on Friday, 6.4, National Donut Day! We'll be featuring our Bruers and the donut partners we worked with to create this collaborative box, including @thedonuttery, @trejosdonuts, @donutfriend, and @dcdoughnut.

node.text:
Does a pie have to be round? What makes a cobbler a cobbler? Is a hand pie really a pie? We like to think of ourselves as a thoughtful group where at The Bruery, and we always try to answer the important questions. Happy Pi Day! Watch our passionate Bruers debate the important questions and check out our Pi Day sale on TheBruery.com featuring pie and pastry inspired beers! Tap the link in our profile to shop.

node.text: Black Tuesday is the backbone of many creations here at The Bruery. It’s a playground for experimentation both in barrel and adjunct. This variation was aged in Rum Barrels for over a year. Still rich in notes of caramel, toasted malt, vanilla, burnt wood, and anise, this variation has additional fruit and spice notes from the rum barrels.

node.text:
A re-imagined ode to a timeless classic, Partridge in a Pear Tree is back! This quadrupel ale pours a brilliant amber color with a moderate head. Inspired by the flavors of Poire à la Beaujolaise— a traditional poached pear dessert of the wine-growing region of Beaujolais. It sings traditionally familiar notes of dark sugar, caramel, and spice for a well-balanced seasonal ale. Meant to be shared over special occasions with family and friends. Watch as our VP of Brewing Operations, Darren Moser, talks tasting notes and inspiration behind this celebratory ale.

Find this and other favorite Bruery beers at your favorite local bottle shop. visit TheBruery.com/find to find it near you!

It's now easier than ever to get your favorite beers:

• Order online for same-day pick up at our Fulfillment Center in OC, open 12-6 PM daily
• Head to TheBruery.com to find our beers at your favorite local bottle shops, grocery stores, and restaurants
• Visit either Tasting Room, open for safe onsite enjoyment and to-go orders. Enjoy plenty of indoor and outdoor seating, and remember, meal tickets are required for onsite beer enjoyment.

node.text:
This collection of Black Tuesday small-batch variants was created to celebrate the release of Black Tuesday 2020.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX

• 6 x 10oz. cans of Black Tuesday DBA variants (2 cans of each variant)
• 2 x 6.5oz. exclusive Sahm Elektra Small tasting glasses 
• Access Level: Hoarders, Reserve
• Limit 1

Available exclusively to Hoarders and Reserve Society members for shipping within California and parts of Nevada, Loakal Delivery, and pick up in OC and DC.

node.text: Black Tuesday was crafted to stand the test of time— to evolve, develop, and mature. One could say that Tuesdays are Timeless. Sweet Magnolias was first conceived as a tiny-batch treatment for our 2016 Black Tuesday party. This imperial stout was aged in bourbon barrels with bananas, Madagascar vanilla beans, and vanilla wafers to mimic the all too familiar flavors of mama’s homemade banana pudding.

node.text:
We made it to Saturday! Celebrate with the quintessential summer beer, Just a Splash. 🍊

A careful combination of saison and wit yeast tee up fresh, slightly tart crispness and just a splash of tangerine juice drives it home. Finished off with a citrus-forward, Mandarina Bavaria dry-hop, this ale shines with subtleties of tangy citrus, soft sweetness, light spice, and fruit notes that pair well with sunny weather and patio hangs.

Swing by the Tasting Rooms this weekend to get it on draft or to go. Hours at both locations:
— Saturday: 12:00 pm - 12:00 am
— Sunday: 12:00 pm - 8:00 pm

Food trucks servin' up the goods this weekend:
— The Bruery: Saturday @4wheelburger | Sunday @dogtowndog
— Terreux: Saturday @noreservationla | Sunday @eatwingbros

node.text:
Happy Friday, and happy public release day! We're excited to get these deeeeelicious beers in your hands. 🍻

𝐂𝐡𝐮𝐫𝐫𝐢𝐨𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐲 is a bourbon barrel-aged imperial stout with dulce de leche and milk sugar for creaminess and cinnamon for that perfect churro flavor, in collaboration with our friends at @horusagedales. 13.6%

𝐂𝐡𝐨𝐜𝐨𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐂𝐡𝐮𝐫𝐫𝐢𝐨𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐲 is a bourbon barrel-aged imperial stout with dulce de leche and milk sugar for creaminess, cinnamon, and cacao nibs to mimic an oooey gooey warm chocolate sauce topping on freshly-made churros, in collaboration with our friends at @horusagedales. 13.7%

𝐉𝐮𝐬𝐭 𝐚 𝐒𝐩𝐥𝐚𝐬𝐡 is a farmhouse wit ale with just a splash of fresh tangerine juice for a perfect summer refresher, with notes of tangy citrus, soft sweetness, light spice, and fresh fruit. 5.3%

𝐅𝐮𝐫 (from @offshootbeerco) is a hazy IPA brewed with Centennial, Simcoe, El Dorado, and Cascade hops in honor of our feline companions. Notes of berries, apricot, fresh passionfruit, and delightful tropical citrus make this hoppy beer purrrrfect. 6.6%

𝐂𝐨𝐚𝐭𝐬 (from @offshootbeerco) is a hazy double IPA brewed with El Dorado, Mosaic, and Galaxy hops to celebrate our furry friends. Notes of berry medley, hints of freshly cut grass, and flavors of earthiness and resin with a tropical twist at the finish paw at your taste buds. 8.9%

𝐆𝐞𝐭 𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐬𝐞 𝐛𝐞𝐞𝐫𝐬 𝐛𝐞𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐲'𝐫𝐞 𝐠𝐨𝐧𝐞:
🚚 Get same-day Loakal Delivery & shipping to 10+ states⁣: TheBruery.com/delivery
🍺 Take it to go or get a fresh tap pour at our Tasting Rooms: TheBruery.com/visit

node.text:
Back and better than ever— Churriosity and Chocolate Churriosity are a match made in pastry stout heaven. This year's edition, in collaboration with our friends at @horusagedales, has been aged in bourbon barrels for added complexity and depth. Mouth watering yet? 🤤

Preservation Society members, head to your allocations now to get priority access to Churriosity, Chocolate Churriosity, plus Just a Splash before they release to the public tomorrow.

Also— head to TheBruery.com/bruetube for more #beyondthebarrel content to learn more about the Churriosity duo and the rest of this month’s releases. 🎥

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Bruery® on August 04, 2021. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
Get out your umbrellas and your favorite glassware— the forecast is calling for Chocolate Rain ☔️ This imperial stout was aged in bourbon barrels and treated with a decadent amount of cacao and vanilla. Save it for a rainy day… or don't, we won't judge.

Chocolate Rain pours a dark, velvety black with mocha-colored head. From first sip to last, this beer emanates rich aromas of of chocolate sauce, dark brownie batter, and bittersweet cocoa. The body is bold and thick with a medley of flavors, including hints of licorice, raspberry sauce, bourbon soaked figs, and red berries with a toasty, slightly spicy finish with hints of vanilla, roasted nuts, and char.

Reserve Society members, your exclusive beers— Chocolate Rain, Satisfies, and Lapu Lapu— are now available in your allocations, as well as early access to all of this month's public beers. Cheers! 🍻

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Bruery® on August 03, 2021. May be an image of drink and food.

node.text:
Happy August, indeed— Sorry, Not Sorry is finally here. A brand-new base beer with monstrous peanut butter cup flavor… we'd say we're sorry, but we're not. 😈

This monster of a stout pours a villainous jet black with a medium mocha cream head. Warming aromas rise from the glass with mouth-watering notes of dark fudge, roasted peanuts, and rich vanilla and bourbon from the time spent in bourbon barrels. The base beer plays a significant role in the decadence of this beer; its high starting gravity allows for big ABV, and the retention of residual sugar creates a velvety smooth and rich body. Inspired notes of chocolate interlace with the taste of roasted peanuts, cookie dough, and just a hint of salt to round it out.

Hoarders: head to your allocations now to get Sorry, Not Sorry, as well as our other Hoarders-exclusive releases— Chaucer's Chalice and Liberty Stoutwich— plus the rest of this month's delicious lineup. Cheers to a decadent August. 🍻

node.text:
Who said Mondays are a bad thing— Society Member Monday is here to kick off our August Release Week. Here's everything you need to know:

𝐌𝐨𝐧𝐝𝐚𝐲: Society Member Monday – Members, come by The Bruery Tasting Room to try all your new release beers. We're open from 12–10pm, with food from @4wheelburger and some special surprise draft options. See you there!

𝐓𝐮𝐞𝐬𝐝𝐚𝐲: Hoarders Allocations Open – access to Chaucer’s Chalice, Liberty Stoutwich, Sorry Not Sorry, plus early access to all the other releases.

𝗪𝐞𝐝𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐝𝐚𝐲: Reserve Allocations Open – access to Chocolate Rain, Satisfies, and Lapu Lapu, plus early access to all public releases.

𝐓𝐡𝐮𝐫𝐬𝐝𝐚𝐲: Preservation Society Allocations Open – early access to all public releases.

𝐅𝐫𝐢𝐝𝐚𝐲: Public release – Just a Splash, Churriosity, and Chocolate Churriosity are available to the public.

node.text:
It's a new month, which means it's time for new beers! We're kicking off Release Week tomorrow with Society Member Monday. Members, stop by The Bruery Tasting Room tomorrow from 12 – 10 pm to get a sampling of all the new beers, PLUS some very special kegs in incredibly limited amounts from our recent 13th Anniversary Celebration. 

Both Tasting Rooms open Today at noon, come on by. 

Sound off— who's coming to Society Member Monday tomorrow? What are you excited to try? 👇
